name: MarketingTipoftheDay-MarketiuDailyBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The most up-to-date Daily Marketing Briefing discussing the latest News and Innovations, and giving Top-industry insights for every brand wanting to take their "game" to the next level. Our topics include Marketing Strategy, Digital Marketing Tools, Marketing Technology, and Social Media, and we are strongly diving into the subject of Voice Technology, Voice Search & SEO, Alexa and Google Assistant, IoT and all the crazy things you NEED to know about.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
